root.name: Rising Sun: Imperial Strike
root.description: Overview Â One of the game's ten scenarios. Released in 2000, Rising Sun: Imperial Strike is the expansion pack to Rising Sun. The game was developed and published by TalonSoft, and released solely on the PC. The game adds around ten new missions to the isometric war simulation. These new missions range from historically based scenarios, to more "what if?" situations, such as one that takes place during a Japanese assault on American soil.
